name: 高得畬
objective:
*Memories
    -Sequential Machines
    -Memory devices: Latch & FF
    -RAM & ROM
    -DFT, MEM BIST
    -State assignment
*Packaging
*ALU design
    -Adders
    -Multiplier
*Backend Design
    -APR
    -Special Net
    -Misc.
*Architecture
*Examples
schedule:
Week / Date / Topics
01. 02/25/22 Chapter 5 (Memory types, Set-up & hold time)
02. 03/04/22 Chapter 5 (Memory devices: Latch, FF, & ROM)
03. 03/11/22 Chapter 5 (Memory devices: RAM , Clock skew) 
04. 03/18/22 Chapter 5 (Memory timing and clock, Testing)
05. 03/25/22 Chapter 5 (Sequential machine, State graph)  
06. 04/01/22 (QZ1) Packaging (Packaging flow and Relibility)
07. 04/08/22 Chapter 6 (ALU, adder)
08. 04/15/22 Midterm Examination 
09. 04/22/22 Exam review , Chapter 6 (Multiplier)
10. 04/29/22 入學測驗
11. 05/06/22 Chapter 7 (Placement & Routing)
12. 05/13/22 Chapter 7 (Special nets, b4TO)
13. 05/20/22 Chapter 8 (Architecture)
14. 05/27/22 (QZ2) Chapter 8 (Architecture)
15. 06/03/22 端午節
16. 06/10/22 Chapter 9  (Example)
17. 06/17/22 Final Examination
18. 06/24/22 Exam review, What’s Next?
scorePolicy:
Two quizzes 30% (15% for each)
Midterm 35%
Final 35%

Final is a MUST!! Or else, wouldn't be graded!!
materials:
Textbook: 
Modern VLSI Design 
System-on-Chip Design, 
Third edition, Prentice Hall, 
by: Wayne Wolf

References:
Embedded Systems Design: A Unified Hardware / Software Introduction, 
 Vahid / Givargis 

Rabaey’s Digital Integrated Circuits, J. Rabaey et al.]

Class Notes:

remarks:
